channel.title: meta on similitude
channel.description: Recent content in meta on similitude

item.title: Hello World (2nd edition)
item.description: Hello world! As I said before this is my blog. I still intend to fill it with content. And this time I’m playing for keeps. Promise! I’ve prepared a lot to make it the website I like to post on. And in the pipeline I have quite some drafts and topics to be published. That being said: Happy 2023, everyone!

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Here’s my blog. Let me share some thoughts with you. This, of course, is but a placeholder.
